question: Name one of the major neighborhoods in Keratsini, Greece.
asked_question_translated: Nosauciet vienu no lielākajām Keratsini apkaimēm Grieķijā.
answer: Viena no lielākajām Keratsini apkaimēm Grieķijā ir Drapetsona.
answer_translated_eng: One of the largest neighbourhoods in Keratsini, Greece, is Drapetsona.
